name: Slash Rush
description:
SLASH RUSH is a mobile reflexion game.

CONTROLS : Click where you want to slash.

You need to destroy all the balloons and not to touch the target.

you will need to optimize perfectly your moves chances to finish the entire game.

Sacrifice your shuriken’s moves to have more try in the next levels.

Example:

- level 1 you have 5 tries, - you choose to keep 3, - you finish the level, - level 2 you will have 2 more tries.

Do not hesitate to note us on the site of the ludum dare : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/slash-rush

Cubs Studio Website : https://timotheydelhaize.com/cubs-studio.php
